sentences.en: A dilapidated house stands disconsolately amid the rubbles.
sentences.cn: 一栋破旧的房子凄凉地耸立在断垣残壁中.

sentences.en: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages.
sentences.cn: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

sentences.en: Hanoi's buildings were dilapidated, and in the style of southern France.
sentences.cn: 河内的建筑物属于法国南部地方的风格,但已经陈旧不堪.

sentences.en: He had checked into the dilapidated Bayamo Hotel on schedule.
sentences.cn: 他按时住进了破旧的贝阿莫旅社.

sentences.en: He pointed to a dilapidated old vehicle that was parked close by.
sentences.cn: 他指着一辆停靠在附近的破旧卡车.

sentences.en: In the meantime, the place became dilapidated, the wind whistled through the cracked walls.
sentences.cn: 在那时候, 这地方变得破落不堪, 风从裂了缝的墙壁呼呼地吹进来.

sentences.en: Sitting down a dilapidated wooden fence near the field.
sentences.cn: 我们在田边一堵东倒西歪的篱笆墙上坐了下来.

sentences.en: The building wore a dilapidated look.
sentences.cn: 这建筑看起来要倒塌了.

sentences.en: The buildings in his pictures are ruined and dilapidated.
sentences.cn: 出现在照片中的这些建筑已经破败、衰落.

sentences.en: The garden has dilapidated through years of neglect.
sentences.cn: 这座花园因年久失修而荒废。

sentences.en: The house is a little more dilapidated than when I last saw it.
sentences.cn: 那房子比我上次见到时更破旧了些。

sentences.en: The house is very dilapidated but it has possibilities.
sentences.cn: 这房子已破旧不堪,但还可有利用的价值.

sentences.en: The pair of dilapidated sandals were beside her chair.
sentences.cn: 破旧的凉鞋在椅子旁边.

sentences.en: The walls of the dilapidated shed lean outward.
sentences.cn: 那座破棚屋的墙向外倾.

sentences.en: There are wild flowers all around this dilapidated place.
sentences.cn: 有点点的野花点缀在这断井颓垣之中.

trans.tran_cn: 残破的，失修的，荒废的，衰败的，破旧，颓
trans.tran_en: A building that is dilapidated is old and in a generally bad condition
